data.title: Pooja Sharma Is All Set To Embrace Motherhood For Second Time, Shares An Adorable Baby Announcement
data.meta_description: Television actress, Pooja Sharma, who was last seen in Diya Aur Baati Hum, is all set to embrace this journey for the second time. The actress shared an
data.text:
Mothers are angels without wings, who fill our days with rainbow lights, and nights with sweet dreams! However, not many poets and writers write about the glorious journey of being a mother that is filled with dizzy days to swollen feet. And guess what? Television actress, Pooja Sharma, who was last seen in Diya Aur Baati Hum, is all set to embrace this journey for the second time. (Recommend Read: Throwback: Aishwarya Rai Recalls When Aaradhya Mistook Ranbir Kapoor To Be Father, Abhishek Bachchan)

advertisement

For those who don’t know, Pooja and her husband, Pushkar Pandit’s love story was nothing less than a fairy tale. The duo first met on the sets of a television show, Tu Mera Hero, and felt the sparks in each other’s eyes. They tied the knot in February 2016 and were blessed with their first child in August 2017. Pooja had treated her fans with a heartfelt note on the arrival of her little angel that reads, “My whole life I knew that I wanted children and that moment is finally here. My mind is blown away by this bundle of joy and I can't thank god enough for this perfect blessing! Dearest Viyana, Welcome to this wonderful world my darling girl. You are so very loved.”

advertisement

advertisement

Yes, Pooja’s inbox is filled with congratulatory messages as she expects her second child with husband, Pushkar. On April 7, 2019, the actress took to her Instagram handle and shared a picture of her first baby posing with a checklist board that read, “Enter the world, Steal hearts, learn to crawl, learn to walk, start talking, become a big sister.” She captioned the picture as, “One more to adore... Soon to be a family of four #babyonboard #ourfamilyisgrowing #blessed”. Take a look at the adorable baby announcement below:

advertisement

advertisement

Pooja also shared a couple of pictures from her vacation with the family. In one of the pictures, she is wearing a casual dress and showing off her baby bump. In another picture, she candidly posed with her daughter, Viyana. Check out the pictures below:

advertisement.

advertisement

advertisement

In a throwback interview, Pushkar had talked about embracing fatherhood, and had shared, “It’s like a dream for us till now. Both mother and daughter are doing good. Our lives have completely changed after God gifted us this beautiful child. It has become amazing. Our family is finally complete and it’s the best feeling. We keep looking at her even when she is sleeping for the fact that we are parents are yet to sink in.” (Also Read: Esha Deol's Unseen Vidaai Video Of Crying Dharmendra, Emotional Deol Clan Will Leave You Teary-Eyed)

He had further added, “I keep teasing Pooja that the baby is like me but I know she is like her, for she is very beautiful. I am happy that she has got my eyes though. When Pooja was pregnant, everyone kept telling us that it will be a boy as the signs suggested but we both wanted a girl. She is our little princess and now everything we do will be to build a happy empire for her.” (Don't Miss: Amitabh Bachchan Reveals How Dynamics And Roles Changed After Aishwarya Rai Came Into Their Family)

ADVT.

Well, we cannot wait to get a glimpse of Pooja's second baby! What about you?

advertisement

Cover and Images Courtesy: Pooja Sharma
